short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add emoji reactions to GitHub code diffs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📦 Emoji reactions for GitHub 

Enhance your GitHub code reviews with intuitive emoji reactions. This Chrome extension allows developers to easily add emojis directly to code diffs for a more expressive and streamlined feedback process.

🔑 Key Features:

- 🚀 Emoji Integration in Code Reviews: Add visual context to your feedback by attaching emojis directly to code lines in GitHub. A simple, yet powerful way to express your thoughts and reactions.
- 😃 User-Friendly Emoji Picker: Select from a wide range of emojis through an accessible picker that appears as you hover over code lines. Tailored for coding contexts, it makes finding the right emoji quick and easy.
- 💬 Streamlined Commenting Process: Enhance communication efficiency in code reviews by using emojis as comments. A single click adds your chosen emoji as a comment, making your feedback more engaging and noticeable.
- 📚 Code Review Emoji Guide: Ensure meaningful emoji communication with our standardized guide, available at Code Review Emoji Guide https://github.com/axolo-co/developer-resources/tree/main/code-review-emoji-guide.

📲 Easy Installation:
Find us on the Chrome Web Store and add a new dimension to your code reviews.

🔍 Simple Usage:
1. Open a GitHub pull request or code review.
2. Hover to reveal the emoji picker on any line of code.
3. Select and click an emoji to add it as a comment.

The Emoji reactions for GitHub  is all about making code reviews more efficient, expressive, and engaging. Try it today and transform your review process!

🆘 Support and Contact Information:

For assistance, queries, or feedback, please reach out to us at hey@axolo.co. We can't wait to receive your feedback to improve this project even more!

👨‍💻 Developer Information:

Emoji reactions for GitHub is developed by Axolo, a company committed to enhancing engineering team collaboration and efficiency. Learn more about us on https://axolo.co
